title: Episode 26: The Path From Trauma To Freedom And Inner Peace W/ Gabby Bernstein
description:
This week we have a special guest, Gabby Bernstein. Gabby is a New York Times bestselling author and spiritual teacher who’s new book “Happy Days” is an incredible testament to the power of healing trauma. We talk about sobriety, vulnerability, and how we can heal the broken parts of ourselves to find peace.

Join the SelfHealers Circle Waitlist:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/waitlist/

PRE-ORDER HOW TO MEET YOURSELF:

https://howtomeetyourself.com/

BUY HOW TO DO THE WORK:

https://www.amazon.com/How-Do-Work-Recognize-Patterns/dp/006301209X

Text Nicole! 215-366-0012

Get my FREE Future Self Journal:

https://theholisticpsychologist.com/
